workflow.name: Create long-form documents from simple titles with GPT-5 and Google Docs
workflow.description:
## How It Works
1. Generate the **document structure** based on the provided **title or short description**.  
2. Use **prompt chaining** to create **detailed content** for each section while maintaining consistent context.  
3. Append the **final content** to a Google Document for easy access and review.

## How to Use
1. Open the submission form.  
2. Enter your **title** and **word count**.  
3. Click **Submit** to generate your Google Document link.  
4. Wait a few minutes ‚Äî completed document will be ready at that link.

## Requirements
- **OpenAI account**  
- **Google Docs account**

## Customization Options
- Adjust the **document length** by changing the word count input.  
- Modify the **prompt logic** to control writing style or tone.  
- Update the **section structure** to fit different document types (e.g., blog, report, proposal).  
- Replace the **output destination** if you prefer another storage option instead of Google Docs.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a professional content generator and technical writer.  
Your task is to generate complete Markdown sections based on a provided JSON structure.

#JSON structure:
{{ $('ContentPlanner').item.json.output.toJsonString() }}

# üß† Instructions
Generate a complete, well-structured Markdown document.
Include all sections in order using their **sectionId**.
Each section should include:
- Heading in the format: `# {sectionId}. {sectionTitle}`  
- Section must not exceed {{Math.floor($('On form submission').item.json['Word Count'] / $('GetSections').item.json.sections.length)}} words

# ‚úçÔ∏è Prompt: Blog Outline Generator Agent

## **Role**
You are a **professional content planner and blog strategist**.

## **Goal**
Analyze the user‚Äôs topic or idea, then **generate a complete blog post outline** with clear structure, logical flow, and engaging section titles.

## **Instructions**
1. Read the user‚Äôs description or topic carefully.  
2. Identify the **main goal** of the article (inform, persuade, educate, or inspire).  
3. Create a **structured outline** with key sections and short explanations for each.  
4. Include **subheadings** (H2, H3) and **logical progression** from introduction to conclusion.  
5. Focus on **clarity, SEO-friendly phrasing, and reader engagement**.  
6. Do **not** write the full article ‚Äî only the **outline and section summaries**.

parameters.formDescription: Help generate long document from a title

parameters.completionTitle: Generating your document‚Ä¶ Please wait a few minutes, then access the link below

parameters.content:
# üß≠ Overview
This workflow takes a title and automatically creates a detailed Google Document.
It first builds an outline, then writes each section based on the word limit, and finally saves everything into the Google Doc.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Setup
1. Connect **Google Docs OAuth** for the `CreateDocument` and `UpdateDocument` nodes.  
2. Add your **OpenAI API Key** for `gpt-5-mini` (outline planner) and `gpt-5` (content writer).  
3. Open the public **Form URL**, submit your Title and Word Count.  
4. The generated Google Document link will appear after submission.

---

## üìù How to Use
1. Open the submission form.
2. Enter your title and word count.
3. Click Submit to generate your Google Document link.
4. Wait a few minutes ‚Äî the completed document will be ready at that link.

---

## üé® Customize
- Change models in **‚Äúgpt-5-mini‚Äù** and **‚Äúgpt-5‚Äù** nodes.  
- Edit outline generation rules in the **ContentPlanner** system prompt.  
- Modify section format and word-cap logic in the **ContentWriter** system prompt.  
- Adjust document title or folder source (Form ‚Üí Title or Folder ID).  
- Update CSS in the **Form node ‚Üí Completion ‚Üí customCss** to match your brand.

---

## üí∞ Costs & Limits
- **OpenAI token usage** scales with *Word Count √ó Number of Sections*.  
- **Execution time limit:** The `gpt-5` node has a 10-minute timeout (increase if needed).  
- For long documents, consider reducing word count per section or batching.  
- **Google Docs API** has write-rate limits ‚Äî this workflow handles appends one section at a time to stay within safe limits.

user.name: Nghia Nguyen
user.bio:
I am Nguyen Trung Nghia, a Software Engineer passionate about AI Automation.
I build intelligent automation systems that help businesses reduce costs, increase productivity, and scale faster with the power of AI technology.
